snippet.title: Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes - Awakened Rivals Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Step into the shoes of Shez as you join Fire Emblem: Three Houses characters, such as the Ashen Wolves, in epic, real-time battles across Fódlan. The house you choose will bring you through one of three compelling stories set in the Fire Emblem: Three Houses universe, each with a different outcome.

Play through the first few chapters of the demo today, and then transfer your save data to the full game when it comes out on June 24, only on Nintendo Switch.

Pre-Order here: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/fire-emblem-warriors-three-hopes-switch/

#FireEmblem #NintendoSwitch
